mapper.select: select count(1) from dynamic where to_days(create_time) = to_days(now()) and create_user_id = #{userId}

SELECT d.*,u.nick_name AS nickName ,u.head_portrait_img AS headPortraitImg FROM ( (SELECT r.id as businessId,r.dynamic_id AS dynamicId ,r.create_user_id AS createUserId ,r.create_time AS createTime,r.reward_num AS businessData , '' as commentId , '' as createDyUser , '' as createDyUserImg , 'reward' as type FROM dynamic_reward r WHERE r.dynamic_id = #{id} ORDER BY r.create_time ASC) UNION (SELECT f.id as businessId,f.dynamic_id AS dynamicId ,f.create_user_id AS createUserId ,f.create_time AS createTime,'' AS businessData , '' as commentId , '' as createDyUser , '' as createDyUserImg , 'fabulous' as type FROM dynamic_fabulous f WHERE f.dynamic_id = #{id} ORDER BY f.create_time ASC) UNION (SELECT c.id as businessId,c.dynamic_id AS dynamicId ,c.create_user_id AS createUserId ,c.create_time AS createTime,c.comment AS businessData , c.comment_id AS commentId,uuu.nick_name AS createDyUser , uuu.head_portrait_img AS createDyUserImg , 'comment' as type FROM dynamic_comment c LEFT JOIN dynamic ddd ON c.dynamic_id = ddd.id LEFT JOIN user uuu ON uuu.id = ddd.create_user_id WHERE c.dynamic_id = #{id} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC) ) AS d LEFT JOIN user u on u.id = d.createUserId
mapper.sql: SELECT record.id as id, record.address as address, record.content as content, record.create_user_id as createUserId, record.create_time as createTime, dyImage.id as imageId, dyImage.dynamic_id as dynamicId, dyImage.url as url, dyImage.type as type, dyImage.create_time as imageCreateTime FROM dynamic record LEFT JOIN dynamic_image dyImage ON record.id = dyImage.dynamic_id
